storyInfo: Jackie is honored for saving lives in a dangerous situation, only to be confronted by a reporter who claims that the incident was fabricated.

attributes.text: 'Many Feared Dead After Major Originium Accident'

attributes.content: This way, please!
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Are you reflecting the official position when you refuse to comment?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: This way! Look at the cameras!
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Did you know about this beforehand?
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: The truth is right here! Answer the questions!
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: A little while ago...
Hyah!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: There you are, Jackie. I was looking for you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Aren't you getting a little excited, Operator Jackie?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry! Are you okay?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Are you hurt?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I'm fine. But you ought to be careful.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Don't get yourself hurt before the award ceremony.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Look at you. Your clothes are all wrinkled now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'm fine, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: There!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Where did you run off to this time?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I sneaked off to the venue. They were pretty busy.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: So I helped them move the equipment onstage.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: You went to help them?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yeah! It was so heavy!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: When I stood onstage, it brought back memories of my dad getting honored.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I was watching from the crowd. Everyone around me was clapping, but I clapped the loudest.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: That's why dad always knew where I was sitting. His face was all serious, but he always flashed a smile at me.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Jackie? What's the matter?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: This time, I was the one up on the stage.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Too bad he was out on assignment and couldn't be there.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I'm sure he's proud of you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I'll tell Dad all about it later!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Before I forget, I need you to come with me.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The government folks say there's something they have to confirm with you before the ceremony.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: To charge into the scene without a second thought, saving so many people in the face of danger...
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Your heroism is admirable, Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Actually, I was just an auxiliary...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: No problem at all. We have talked to Rhodes Island about your situation.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Including your Oripathy.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I understand that Rhodes Island has provided a full report on your condition?
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Affirmative. Rhodes Island takes full responsibility for our operators' health.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Whatever guarantees you need, we'll give.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Well, it's no trouble, really, as long as there are no clearly visible signs.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: We have a contingency plan if someone wants to make something bigger of it than it is.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Contingency?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: A young officer contracted Oripathy in the course of saving lives while off-duty.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: That will be the official explanation.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: But then...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: That's just the worst-case scenario. We'll try to avoid any unexpected issues.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You'll always be an honored member of the Columbian Police Force, no matter what.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Just like your father.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: I... I'm not like my father. He's the spirit of a true policeman.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Well, then, here's your chance.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Prove to your father that you're a hero, just like him.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Take this and read it.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: 'Were you thinking about your family when you rushed in?'
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: 'Your father is a police officer too. What did he think about your actions?'
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: 'How are you feeling now? Any lasting effects on work and everyday life?'
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Do I have to answer everything according to this sheet?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I know you have questions. However...
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: You have to cultivate the best possible public image, so as not to disappoint your father.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Wouldn't you agree, Officer Jackie?
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Officer...?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Yes, Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: That's you.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: This is an honor for the government, for the police force...
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: For you.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: And for your father.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I'll go and prepare.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'll handle it!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Let me introduce you to the representative of the people you rescued before the ceremony.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: He's very grateful and insists on conveying his gratitude in person.
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Sure!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: My face is clean, right?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Just a heads-up, Jackie...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The government hasn't sent official notice to Rhodes Island about their intention to re-hire you to the police force.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's possible that whatever that man said was just for publicity purposes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: How are my clothes? Anything sticking out in the back?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Looking fine.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Did you hear what I said, Jackie? You're too nervous.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yeah... but this is my first time on a stage.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I don't really know why...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: But I'm sure Dad will be in the audience.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: What if I say or do something wrong? He'll see right through me.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: But there are so many people down there, and I can't see him.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: What would be the look on his face?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Would he be disappointed?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I know I'm not worthy of the 'officer' title yet.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: It's okay if I can't get back onto the force.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Give me that sheet.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I want to do my best, like my dad sitting there.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Officer Jackie? The staff told me you were here.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: May I have a quick interview before the ceremony?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Here's my ID. I'm...
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Excuse me, we're busy right now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: There will be time for media questions at the ceremony.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It'll just take a minute!
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: You were talking about a sheet. Is it the one you're holding? Sorry, I didn't mean to eavesdrop.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: It's just that... this is important.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Excuse me.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Let's go, Jackie. Don't keep that guy waiting.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Hey, wait!
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I'll answer at the ceremony!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (I've told everyone how amazing Dad is. Nothing gives him trouble, not catching bad guys, not saving lives.)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (That's how the press has always reported on him. He's a model officer! Dad doesn't like it when I carry news clippings and photos of him with me, though.)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (I know most of the people he helped.)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (When they come to visit, they always tell me I should become an officer just like him. Dad would say that I'm just an auxiliary who still has a lot to learn.)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (I've never actually seen all the medals he earned. I wonder why he never takes them home.)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (This'll be the first medal in our house!)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Officer Jackie, right?
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I knew it! I could recognize you a mile away.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: You probably don't recognize me! All our faces were covered in soot that day.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: Oh, it's you!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Let me push your wheelchair.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Oh, I'm totally fine. Look!
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: I insist! Let me help.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Haha, okay, okay.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: Thank you, Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: Hehe...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: This way, please, Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Can we take another, Mr. Mayor?
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Excuse me, Officer, could you stand closer to the mayor?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: We need both of you in the shot, please.
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Officer, please stand tall!
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Could you straighten out your clothes, please?
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Officer Jackie, were you thinking about your family when you rushed in that day?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: You know how dangerous it was, better than any of us here.
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Was there any hesitation in your heart?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Come on, folks, Officer Jackie has been through a lot, and this is her first time getting honored. It's understandable that she would be a little nervous.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: One by one, please. No rush.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Her father is also an outstanding officer. He has stood exactly where she is right now.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: He was just as nervous as you are now!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Yes, I remember!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: It was many years ago, when Dad was just an ordinary officer at the local station.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: He was on duty...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.text: If he's down there right now...

attributes.content: Officer Jackie?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: It was my duty as a police officer.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I didn't have time, and the situation... didn't allow me to hesitate. Every second counted for the people trapped inside.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: The moment I rushed in...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I thought about my father, but even more so, his encouragement... and expectations.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: That hardened my resolve to help those trapped people.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: You mentioned your father. What did he think about your actions?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: As a police officer, my father's duty is to his post.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Unfortunately, he could not be here today.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: But I'm sure he's proud of me.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Is that why you joined the force?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: To become a police, help others, and prove yourself to your father?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I didn't start helping people because I joined the force.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Just like my father, he...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Ah.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: May I interrupt?
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: I just want to say that, whether it's Officer Jackie or her father...
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: It makes average folks like us feel really safe to know that there are people like them protecting us, passing the torch from one generation to the next.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: I'm also really grateful for the mayor's invitation, allowing me to thank my savior in person.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: The honor is all mine.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: It's my sincere hope that this spirit will be passed on not just in the police force, but throughout all departments of the government.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Let it inspire all of us public servants to truly be worthy of the name, to serve the people, lead by example, and protect our citizens.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Photo, Officer Jackie. A little closer please.
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Smile, officer.
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Officer Jackie!
Officer Jackie!
Officer Jackie!
Don't worry, you could do a backflip here without anyone seeing you.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: (Deep breath)
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I... I don't know!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Is this how things are?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Did Dad have to do this? Go along with everything they want...?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: It's a show for the media, Jackie.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They paint a picture for you, make you answer questions in a way that fits their public image.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You don't need any of these to prove yourself, though. Everyone at Rhodes Island knows your kindness and courage.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We all know your father is a true hero.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: If you really can't handle it... you can leave.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Rhodes Island will take care of the rest.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: No! I won't leave like this.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I'm not worried about the media or any honors.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I... I can do it! I'm serious!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Then what are you worried about?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: 'Become a true police officer, an example for my daughter and the people.'
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: All that I heard in the crowd...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Did he really think that way? Was that what he wanted me to hear?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You saved lives. That's a fact.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You earned this medal, whatever other plans they might have in mind.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Are you going back?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: On behalf of the government, the police force...
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: The persons rescued and their families...
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: I hereby confer the Medal of Outstanding Valor to Officer Jackie for her role in this rescue operation.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: May you continue to contribute to the city and its citizens as a representative of the government and the police force.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Mr. Mayor! Mr. Mayor!
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I have a question!
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Who are you? Where's your media pass?
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: As the only person who was inside the accident site, do you recognize the people in this photo?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I need an answer!
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: These two were killed in the accident.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I tried to help them...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: How many did you save?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Four.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Are they in the photo?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I'm not sure. It was a very chaotic situation. I didn't have time to look at their faces.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Then let me ask the rescued persons representative here. Do you recognize the people in the photo?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: No, I don't.
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: You don't? Really?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Notify the police! Arrest this intruder!
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Hey, you have a hero cop right here. Get her to arrest me.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Another accolade to her record.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Why you!
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Arrest him, Officer Jackie!
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: No, go ahead.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Sure. Let's see how far we can take this.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: According to media reports, it was a family of seven that was involved in this accident. The cause was the family's second son, whose infection had progressed furthest, and certain things that the mayor would prefer no one talked about.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I'm warning you!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: The government has not made their identities public, but I managed to get a photo of the family, right here.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: You confirmed the two deceased and rescued four more, which makes seven together with the second son.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: But you, the rescued persons representative, don't recognize your own family?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I just...
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: My family's fine! Why are you asking all this?
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: This man just survived a traumatic event.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: What are you getting at?!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: This man was dismissed from the police force not long ago. This is his service record.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: But for some reason, I couldn't find any service record for you, Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: No complaints, no commendations, no overtime.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: You just happened to show up, and be the only one to rush into the accident site, of all the officers on scene.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Oh, right, your father is a hero. What if the daughter of the hero is a hero too?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: The perfect story, isn't it? For Mr. Mayor's re-election campaign, and for the government's image, which hasn't been so squeaky-clean lately.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Your father is an outstanding police officer.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: But are you?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Are you a police officer at all?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Officer Jackie!
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Are you reflecting the official position when you refuse to comment?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: This way! Look at the cameras!
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Did you know about this beforehand?
attributes.name: Rude Reporter

attributes.content: Jackie, I've contacted Rhodes Island. They're looking into it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Say nothing.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Is he telling the truth, Mr. Mayor?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: Hogwash! This is pure fabrication, all of it!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: He is trying to defame and slander our hero!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Security! Get this man!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Take him into custody!
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Hey! You?!
attributes.name: Government Official

attributes.content: Officer Jackie! What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: I have questions for this man. I won't let you take him away.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Get out of my way!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: What do you want to ask?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I don't know what happened today.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I was just glad to see the man I rescued, safe and sound.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: But you tell me he's a fake, and this is all just a show?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Is it not?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I know that the accident wasn't fake.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: The people I saved... the people who died...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: None of that was fake.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Where are the people I rescued? The real ones?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: How could you not know?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Why are you asking me? How should I know why they can't be here?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be asking the one who planned all this?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I-I don't know anything. Don't ask me!
attributes.name: Rescued Persons Representative

attributes.content: What's going on, Mr. Mayor?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: This does not concern you. You've crossed a line.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Watch yourself. You're representing the police force, and your father.
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Why did you rush in? Weren't you at all scared of all those terrorists?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: Some are claiming that your reckless actions sparked the terrorists' brutal response, resulting in harm to the victims. How do you respond?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: I heard that your daughter was in the police as well. Would you want her to do the same, if it was you who was trapped inside?
attributes.name: Reporter

attributes.content: To be completely frank, I don't feel the need for these questions, or even for any reporting about this.
attributes.name: Father

attributes.content: But if I had to give an answer...
attributes.name: Father

attributes.content: I would never stand idly by and watch someone die, if there's anything I could do about it.
attributes.name: Father

attributes.content: But I'm not a police officer. That's my father.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: So you admit it?
attributes.name: Independent Reporter

attributes.content: I'm not fit to represent my father.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: He's a true hero! Don't you dare doubt him!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: All I know right now is that four people have gone missing.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I saved their lives. They should be here, but they're not.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Where are they?!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Mr. Mayor.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Answer my question, or else...
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: O-Or else what?!
attributes.name: Mayor

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Oh, so this is the place?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I've looked into it. This is where the four people are.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: They were infected with Oripathy in the accident, so...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So the government doesn't want them to show their faces in public, even in Columbia.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: The cause of the accident isn't exactly something that the government wants to see come to light, after all.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: 'A young officer contracted Oripathy in the course of saving lives while off-duty.'
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: They'll think of a story, no matter what.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: That story just happened to be you, this time.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Will they be okay?
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: We'll work with the local government to ensure that they receive proper treatment.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Although the... incident... might have made things a little harder.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh no, I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You saved four lives at great risk to yourself soon after being assigned to Columbia.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The Doctor will be glad to hear it.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Good work, Officer Jackie.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh, you kept the medal?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: I still have to tell Dad the story, after all.
attributes.name: Jackie

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Jackie
